summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the south 210 feet of alley, block 8, Squire's Lakeside Addition, being the alley between Rainier Avenue and 36th avenue South, from Dakota Street North by paving and otherwise improving the same in accordance with Majority Petition No. 115425 of the City Council of the Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
